GSD.description:
f2fs: fix to do sanity check on destination blkaddr during recovery

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.220 by commit 68b1e607559d3dc85f94b0d738d7c4e8029b0cfa. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: f2fs: fix to do sanity check on destination blkaddr during recovery
